summary: Buffs up Shadomere a bit and places a spell tome that teaches you how to call him in the pool he first appears in.
descriptionHtml:
Buffs up Shadomere a bit and places a spell tome that teaches you how to call him in the pool he first appears in.

Compatable with Armored Horses, just put this before A.H. in the load order.

Please let me know if it doesn\'t work or you find bugs (especially if you know how to fix them).
author: ArmedKevin117
